title.rendered: FAST BITCOIN CARDING METHOD – ATOMIC WALLET

content.rendered:
You can buy bitcoin straight from your atomic desktop wallet with your Fullz.

For this method we will card using the desktop app and not the website. All transactions are made via the app

Requirements:

  • PC – We will install the app on pc
  • VM – Optional. You can install the tools in virtual machine
  • wcc-plug account – Buy all your Fullz from wcc-plug.su
  • Fullz – To avoid verification, use Fullz with all personal info

For easy carding, always use a card with all fullz info as it saves you time to get background info and speed up verification process.

Site: https://atomicwallet.io/buy-bitcoin

Steps:

  1. Register and Buy Fullz from WCC-PLUG.RU

Go to wcc-plug.cc and create a new account, fill your email and create password.
Use this direct link site: https://wcc-plug.su

Once you have your account created. Go to deposit and follow deposit guide and load up btc to your account. You will need to have a balance in the next step while buying the Fullz.


A good way to choose the cards in the wcc-plug site is to always select the cards with all info checked. From the image above. If we are to choose a USA card. We will choose the one In the green highlight as it has all the info. This will help fill our security questions easily.
Address and personal info are needed. We will use an AU Card for this guide

Download Atomic Wallet App

Now visit the atomic wallet official website and download the app: https://atomicwallet.io/downloads
Download and install the app to your pc. Make sure you have your proxies connected before you install the app. In my case its an Au Card so I will connect to same state or city

This is what the app looks like. Currently we have no balance but we will card and buy btc with our AU Fullz

  1. Buy Crypto in Atomic

Now go to the Buy crypto tab and select the amount of the USD you want to spend for buying crypto. Amount up to $400 is advised for the first purchase. Do not go with higher amounts as you may be asked for more verification on checkout.

I chose $200 on this one.

  1. Fill your Fullz info.

Enter the details of your Fullz in order as they are requested. Type them carefully and don’t paste any info.

The first form will require you to fill the card details.

Accept all the checks an continue

Fill your personal info as of the Fullz info.

Now click on Pay Now button

  1. Verify email

To continue a verification email will be sent to your mailbox. You will have to enter the code to continue.

  1. Select the Currency

Choose the currency you want the card to be charged with. The local currency is better since you don’t have to pay currency conversion fees

The amount indicated will be the final amount charged in your card

Hit continue when done

  1. Payment Authorization

Now we are ready with the payment preparation and we can try to charge the card.

Wait for the verification to complete. At this point the gateway is checking if the billing info matches correctly. When done, you will be redirected to the payment window

Your payment should work fine if you passed verification phase.

  1. Order Summary

Now in a matter of minutes you will receive the balance in your wallet. A confirmation and receipt will be sent to your email. You can also track the transaction and balance of your address in blockchain

just paste your btc address in blockchain.com/explorer site and view all transactions made in and out of your address
